column3: â€œI received an 1/8 of this from a dealer and was told it was lemon g. as long as I lived in Ohio I had never tried this strain. the bud was beautiful, dense, frosty and it smelled very lemony. so on Saturday night I seshed with my friends and we shared a blunt with maybe 1.5 in it and we couldn't stop laughing and cracking jokes. it got to the point where we couldn't breathe from laughing. after the high it put me dir...â€

â€œOne of my favorite CBD strains. The best thing about this strain is that it is very appealing in many different ways! The structure is amazing, providing nugs with so much frost even the pistils have a white milky look to them. The aroma is a nice lemon, earthy smell. Great for relaxing without being couch locked. Perfect for outside activity or gardening. Great for anxiety, studying, social gatherings, etc get your ...â€

â€œI am an indica gal 100% but this is by far my favorite strain that I never go without having some on me at all times, whether it be flower or concentrate.  The limonene terpenes that are so very strong and pungent throughout this strain help with my daily stomach pains and nausea, it keeps me creative and uplifted throughout the day without any anxious or paranoid lingering feelings.  Every single time I share this s...â€

â€œDecided to pickup a half ounce from my local dispensary, I gotta say this particular batch is quite stoney and gives an indica feel similar to its G13 parent. This Lemon G also has a strong lemon scent and I'd say it isn't too harsh of a smoke. I give it a 4/5â€
â€œAthens to Cincinnati, lemon G is a southern Ohio strain.  Been smokin it for years always and forever my favorite.â€

â€œThe epitome of citrus flavor. You can smell this strain walking into the dispensary, even with it in a sealed jar. No joke. If you love that lemony smell and taste, this strain is a no-brainer for you. One of the best feeling sativas I've ever had the pleasure of smoking. Not crazy potent, but definitely a nice cerebral buzz to get that conversation started. Day-time bud, or a night-time bud if you're planning on say...â€
â€œI actually passed out from a single hit of some Lemon G from OU in Athens, OH.â€

â€œFull, dense, perfectly trimmed nugs coated in trichomes and a nice amount of orange hairs. Pungent, sweet, lemony aroma that reminds me of a lemon cleaning solvent, like lemon pledge. Once ground up, the aroma becomes even more pungent and the smell begins to fill the room. When smoking, it taste like it smells, but in a good way, and the flavor becomes much stronger on the exhale. With mainly a rushing head high whi...â€

â€œFull, dense, perfectly trimmed nugs coated in trichomes and a nice amount of orange hairs. Pungent, sweet, lemony aroma that reminds me of a lemon cleaning solvent, like lemon pledge. Once ground up, the aroma becomes even more pungent and the smell begins to fill the room. When smoking, it taste like it smells, but in a good way, and the flavor becomes much stronger on the exhale. With mainly a rushing head high whi...â€

â€œone of the loudest citrus smells out there coupled with a just as powerful skunky undertone some have even described as gravy smell but is most closely described as lemon and musky diesel??? whatever it is its loud and it stays loud.  The lemon presence stays is evident and yummy till the last hit. At first expect about ten minutes of medicated couch lock and muscle relaxation. After expect 60 minutes of a nice sativ...â€
â€œGreat strain . Quick head high. Felt very creative when on this was able to write a lot.â€

â€œLemon G is one of my new favorite strains. I was Leary at first being that its listed as a Sativa and I'm more of an Indica fan. Which I still dont understand being that it comes from Indica parents. Namely G13..But wow. First off the smell of this strain is amazing. Very strong smell that wakes up the room the minute your open up the packaging container. A very bright Earthy Lemony  smell..  Same with the flavor. A ...â€

â€œI have had this in both FLOWER and In a concentrate by Terrapin I rest applicator 48/42 THC - CBD in concentrate.
This review is about that IREST APPLICATOR.
I live in extreme pain 20+ years...so controlling it is job 1 and doing it without NARCOTICS is hard...but this will help.
This is an applicator with 1 gram of concentrate with 48.2% THC n 42.3 CBD n 1.4% CBG.....
I take a small piece of a Hershey bar...n add 5-...â€

â€œMy second review on this strain as I have decided it is my all time favorite Sativa (or day time) CBD strain. Gumbi is my favorite Indica (or evening and nighttime) CBD strain. I like the affordability of Lemon G more than Gumbi as well. 
.
Lemon G is super mellow and offers medical relief. I am someone who gets anxious or edgy from most Sativa strains. Lemon G doesn't get me dis-functional or anxiously stoned at all...â€

â€œOne of the best strains I've ever come across.  Lemon G brings a fresh feeling in my lungs when I inhale it.  It is fresh tasting and not at all harsh on the lungs.  It has a very distinct lemon taste and aroma to it.  The aroma is not at all distasteful and so I feel as if you don't have to worry at all about reeking of it around others as it only leaves a fresh scent of lemons, which the average person would not as...â€

â€œWow Lemon G, you sure surprised me! 

I figured I was just picking up another lemony sativa that be mediocre nothing special. Wrong!

The buzz is VERY uplifting. I suffer from various mood problems, and this brings me out of it very fast.

Picked up a half gram distillate syringe 40% THc 30% CBD by Terrapin 
this is now one of my favorites.

You can feel the G13 parent, and ai can medicate any time of day with this.â€

This review is about that IREST APPLICATOR.
I live in extreme pain 20+ years...so controlling it is job 1 and doing it without NARCOTICS is hard...but this will help.

I take a small piece of a Hershey bar...n add 5-...â€

â€œLemon G at Terrapin Care station is their prided CBD strain with 13% THC and 9% CBD. Super well rounded and packs that head clearing punch that CBD strains have and gives a tinge through the body with a euphoric sense. Nugs are very dense, berry like packed with orange hairs and a skunky lemon scent. Taste lends more
 to that sour skunk than citrus.â€

â€œWow Lemon G, you sure surprised me! 

I figured I was just picking up another lemony sativa that be mediocre nothing special. Wrong!

The buzz is VERY uplifting. I suffer from various mood problems, and this brings me out of it very fast.

The aroma is not at all distasteful and so I feel as if you don't have to worry at all about reeking of it around others as it only leaves a fresh scent of lemons, which the average person would not as...â€

.
Lemon G is super mellow and offers medical relief. I am someone who gets anxious or edgy from most Sativa strains. Lemon G doesn't get me dis-functional or anxiously stoned at all...â€

â€œThe lab analysis for this strain at my dispensary weren't impressive.  With about 13.5% thca, 0.3%thc and trace cbda, I was buying this strain for the taste and appearance, expecting to have to use more to get to my desired dosage.  The smell is a funky lemon and not so much a fresh lemon.  It is more like the smell of lemon squeezed on fried food.  The flavor is like the smell and kind of like lemon flavored potato ...â€

â€œThe Lemon G that I got from The LoDo Wellness Center in Denver is definitely aromatic and tastes of citrus; contrary to the description provided on leafly.  It is definitely an uplifting Sativa, but it does have a paranoid Indica effect initially.  It eventually wore off within about ten minutes but I have been a heavy smoker for years so I wouldn't recommend this strain for new smokers, it might just ruin your whole...â€
â€œI had the equivalent of about two normal sized dabs of some live resin and within moments I was feeling a nice high.â€

â€œPatients say Lemon G can deliver an exceptional ability to uplift the spirit and induce happiness. Patients with symptoms of chronic pains and aches say they like its ability to take the mind away from focusing on illnesses.â€

â€œGot the oil today with a wild berry flavor, which is a tad overpowering, but sweet+ tasty. Def helps pain, anxiety, stress..while energizing so you can get things done. Not overpowering at all. Would prob give 4.5 if possible, as my strain is not very cerebral..â€
â€œSuper duper.  My caregiver gave me this from Ohio" strain last week and I can't get enough.

column1: Though I usually prefer an indica this sativa rocks.
A great smoke if you have chores to do.  Keeps you moving along. Also loads of laughs and giggles.  Very uplifting.
A good day time smoke or out dancing kind of smoke.

column2: so lemony.  Though very pungent and needs to be in a good glass jar o...â€"

column3: â€œI love this strain for my wake n bake, itâ€™s like drinking a cup of coffee, I do mix it with a indica because itâ€™s only 13.93%thca but it wakes me up, gets me out of bed without fighting the alarm clock to many rounds! Itâ€™s also great for sex, very arousing and gives me focus!â€

â€œGood for inflammation and chronic pain with it's CBD to THC ratio .
Smooth and relaxing highâ€

â€œThe Lemon G that I got from The LoDo Wellness Center in Denver is definitely aromatic and tastes of citrus; contrary to the description provided on leafly.  It is definitely an uplifting Sativa, but it does have a paranoid Indica effect initially.  It eventually wore off within about ten minutes but I have been a heavy smoker for years so I wouldn't recommend this strain for new smokers, it might just ruin your whole...â€

-carefree
-great energy

Took a rip and had a smile on my face the whole time. Nothing bothered me and I was a bit talkative. Was able to get everything done and felt super accomplished! Th...â€

Even though I don't smoke it that often anymore ...â€

â€œSo funky smooth but it is super tasty not like the overview in my opinion. ..we love the red's and purples late in flower. ..takes a little longer but holy shit guys worth it. ..it's like rotting lemons citrus funky dankness. ..â€

â€œWow can you say funk this is some shit. I love the lemon funk smell then you hit this and wow so doesn't taste like the smell which is kinda cool weird and funky damn. ..right here in the Midwestâ€

â€œOne of my favorites, by far. LOVE the awesome high I get, I actually wanted to go out and do things instead of being couch-locked.â€

â€œLemon G
Terrapin whole flower
THC 11.12%
CBD 8.19%
1 gram $12
 
No cough. Barely discernible lemon scent.  No buzz at all.  Slightly sticky light fluffy  bud.â€
â€œNice easy smoke, not too harsh or intense. Helped with pain and stress and insomnia.â€

â€œThe effects of the strain come on very strong and initially can be a tad sedating with an uptick in energy as the effects plateau. The scent of the strain is REMARKABLE, hints of a pungent fuel are buried under an ocean of citrusy lemon. For such a strong smell, the taste is not a very strong one.â€

â€œTo describe the taste of this as mellow is a UNDERSTATEMENT!! Literally imagine fresh lemon zest and thatâ€™s exactly what this smells and tastes like, attests from my dispensary breakwater atc in jersey. I love this strain and suggest it to everyone. Too much of this will put you out!â€

The citrus scent with hints of spice and sweets hits your nose the second you open your jar, becoming more overt after the flower is well-ground.  It's a very smooth smoke, easy to inhale while down with a cold.  The taste reflects ...â€

â€œOh Lemon G, how I love thee!  Slightly dense trich covered lime green nugs with a knockout lemon scent when broken up...flavor is lemony, but more sweet than tart.  Put my back pain on the back burner, too!â€

â€œWell, it was definitely a head/cerebral effect. It had hazy in spades. Felt like half of a high though, like it was missing the euphoria, painkilling, and uplifting components of Golden Goat or Strawberry Cough. I wouldn't call it a bad time, but I would choose something else for the effects I'm after (uplifting, creative, euphoric, anxiety-reducing).â€

â€œthis really depends on the batch it always taste great but some times you have to smoke a lot i dont care what anyone says im from southwest ohio and ive had this plenty of times and last couple times shits done the job but nothing special id say really depends on whos caring for it and what phenotype they haveâ€

â€œvery nice relaxing effects I'm uplifted and chilled, got this strain from Trinidad at the Grand opening of Rocky Mountain Cannabis. this strain has a flavorful citrus smell that makes your mouth water, most definitely smoke this with a pipe to get the full flavor effects.ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜â€

â€œIâ€™m only giving this 3 stars because I donâ€™t like the taste but I love the high! Very relaxing and the first night I smoked it, it put me to sleep! Not a big fan of the taste, but I recommend this strain if you need to relax.â€

â€œI picked up a pre-roll of Lemon G at my dispensary just to try it. 
I had not tried this strain yet and wanted to try it. Took a couple of hits and noticed a nice calm cerebral high. I noticed a nice relaxation also. This strain is not racy or too buzzy for me. I really like this strain, it has a nice lemony taste.â€

â€œI think this funky ass pungent spicy decayed lemon peel crazy ass medicine. ..watching the ufc pay per view again with a patient ....damn very cerebral so nice. .the buds came like 17 grams and more she grows very big so plan accordingly. ..enjoyâ€

â€œThis is really great for depression.  I feel that it is uplifting without the accompanying anxiety that I usually associate with heady strains.  It eases my mind and keeps me doing things.  I'm usually down for the count after smoking, but I ended up staying awake much longer than I had intended to during the first night.  The value is good because it is so strong.â€
â€œGreat for morning and early afternoon.â€
â€œLemon? Check. G? Check. Gets the job done.â€

â€œPick this up from the dispensary on smell alone. The batch i got was testing at almost 1:1 thc/cbd. Very relaxing and euphoric for both my body and mind, very clear headed and energetic later in the high. The small is fantastic but its taste is no where near as strong.â€
â€œBetter than coffee and happy as the Sun shining in the sky! It's my fight fatigue-wake my butt up NOW-med xoâ€

â€œGood strong buzz, definite anxiety killer that spills over after the comedown, insomnia doesn't stand a chance against it. On the other hand, severe couchlock, extreme hungriness, and SLEEPINESS can emphasize that enough. It's definitely a specialized strain well equipped for anxiety, insomnia, even hyperactivity patients; and for that i definitely recommend.â€
â€œFlavor lovers paradise. One of the main Ohio specialty strains the others being Dumpster, Death Star, and Meigs County Gold.â€
â€œReally good budâ€
â€œSmoked this out of a bong earlier. Tasted very good and had a strong kick to it. Made me vibe to a whole new level.â€

â€œI'm new to medical cannabis but not to cannabis in general. I've been smoking for about 10 years now and I've smelled all sorts of delightful scents etc but holy shit is this the truest to a piece of fruits smelling bud I've ever had!!! It's as if you just put a little lemon zest on your hand and smelled it, that's this strain. The effects are great to for getting through the day !â€
â€œWay too happy. One of the best highsâ€

â€œUnlike anything I had had before.  Extreme citrus smell and taste to this bud.  VERY unique!   If you get the chance to smoke this strain. DO ITâ€

â€œLoved this strain. Received it from a friend to try. I fell in love with the taste of this. Somewhere between a lemon and a pine tree smell. The high hits me immediately and I feel lighter, unlike lots of what I've had recently the Lemon G makes me feel motivated.â€

â€œOne of my fav strains around. Not a big fan of Sativas but this Hybrid is on point. It feels like a really nice indica without the overpowering sedative effects of an typical Indica. Gotta love that G13â€
